 2018-14412018-11-22,  ,  ,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOptional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary for Canada to accede to the OPTIONAL PROTOCOL TO THE CONVENTION ON THE RIGHTS OF PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES, adopted in New York, on December 13, 2006.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
